author: jleroux
msg: Fix "Pagination Problem in Accounting Module" reported by Naveen Kumar N at https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-4158 - OFBIZ-4158

The getInvoicePaymentInfoListByDueDateOffset service called for the pagination is only reading data (it likes a performFind). So no security issues is to be feared. Hence using <security https="false" in the controller is an acceptable solution. I have tried others keeping security but none worked

author: brianf
msg: set the site version back to 2.2

author: kristwaa
msg: DERBY-4939: Enable istat daemon and tests
Enabled the automatic creation and scheduling of index cardinality statistics
NOTE: To disable the feature, use 'derby.storage.indexStats.auto=false'.
